availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, magistrate. Ohio native. Married to Mildred Gregory Matlack in Jefferson County, Kentucky on April 17, 1844. Father of Elizabeth J. Matlack, William Matleck, Hunter Matlack, and Samuel Matlack. Magistrate in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482707.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 5, p. 115.
Find A Grave, "Samuel Matlack (1815-1881)," Memorial #134790923, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/134790923 (accessed May 14, 2019).
